Page2.title: Introduction to Python
Page2.text: Python is a versatile programming language used in many fields like web development, data science, automation, and more.

Page2.title: Python Syntax
Page2.text: Python syntax is simple and readable, making it a popular choice for beginners and professionals alike.

Page2.title: Python Libraries
Page2.text: Python has a rich ecosystem of libraries such as NumPy, pandas, and Flask that help in various domains.

Page2.title: Python for Data Science
Page2.text: Python is widely used in data science for tasks like data manipulation, analysis, and machine learning.
